comics.title: Dylan Dog: l'Alba dei Morti Viventi
comics.author: Claudio Villa
comics.description: A thrilling horror comic featuring the nightmarish adventures of Dylan Dog, the Nightmare Investigator, as he battles the living dead in a chilling tale.

comics.title: Saga
comics.author: Brian K. Vaughan
comics.description: A sci-fi/fantasy epic about two lovers from warring races trying to protect their daughter while fleeing across the galaxy.

comics.title: One Piece
comics.author: Eiichirō Oda
comics.description: A young pirate, Luffy, sails the seas with his crew in search of the legendary treasure One Piece to become the Pirate King.

comics.title: Watchmen
comics.author: Alan Moore, Dave Gibson
comics.description: In an alternate 1980s, retired superheroes investigate a murder while uncovering a conspiracy that could change the world.

comics.title: Chainsaw Man
comics.author: Tatsuki Fujimoto
comics.description: Denji, a devil hunter fused with a chainsaw demon, battles devils in a brutal world while chasing a better life.
